archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Protection Simulation Software - ETAP
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Electrical Transient Analyzer Program (ETAP) is an electrical network modeling and simulation software tool used by power systems engineers to create an "electrical digital twin" and analyze electrical power system dynamics, transients and protection.
ETAP® is an analytical engineering solution company specializing in the simulation, design, monitoring, control, operator training, optimizing, and automating power systems. ETAP’s integrated digital twin platform offers the best comprehensive suite of enterprise solutions.
https://etap.com/ https://etap.com/docs/default-source/whats-new/etap-18-1-new-features-brochure-v1.pdf?sfvrsn=52
